description:
If the BEA reports an annual rate of change below 0.0% in real GDP from the preceding quarter for Q3 of 2024, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be reporting from the United States Bureau of Economic Analysis, specifically the GDP "Advance Estimate" release for Q3 of 2024.

The GDP release will be made available here: https://www.bea.gov/data/gdp/gross-domestic-product

The BEA's GDP release for Q3 of 2024 is scheduled for October 30, 2024.

Note: data in the first available GDP report is labelled by the BEA as an "Advance Estimate". The data found in the advance estimate will be used to resolve this market. Data may be revised during the following quarter or as a part of the next estimate's publication, however any revisions to GDP report data made after the release of the advance estimate will not be considered for this market's resolution.

events.title: US GDP declines in Q3 2024?

question: US GDP declines in Q3 2024?
